title: Yao Jing Zhong Zhi Shou Ce
alternative_title: Demon Spirit Seed Manual, Fairy Planting Manual, 妖精种植手册
description: Yuan Ding, an otaku, was transported to another world. After taking Shuo Yue Academy's entrance exam, Yuan Ding's life in another world begins, aiming to collect the Demon Spirits said to exist in the legends.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
